description: GP40 diesel-electric locomotive in the classic Union Pacific yellow and gray paint scheme. This model features finely detailed bodywork, authentic paint, and accurate decals. DCC-ready with a factory-installed 8-pin plug for the decoder of your choice, it’s perfect for collectors and model railroad enthusiasts alike.

F7 diesel-electric locomotive in the iconic Santa Fe Warbonnet paint scheme. This model features intricate detailing, vibrant colors, and precise decals. Equipped with DCC for directional control, speed adjustment, and lighting functions, it’s an excellent choice for model railroaders and collectors alike.

A4 Class Mallard steam locomotive in British Railways blue livery. This model boasts fine detailing, authentic paint, and accurate decals. It features a working smoke unit and is DCC-ready, making it a standout piece for any model railway. With its historical significance and elegant design, it’s a must-have for collectors and steam enthusiasts alike.

GP38 diesel-electric locomotive in the classic Canadian Pacific red and gray paint scheme. This model features finely detailed bodywork, authentic paint, and accurate decals. Equipped with standard DC, a powerful motor, and smooth operation, it’s an excellent choice for collectors and railroad enthusiasts alike.

SD40-2 diesel-electric locomotive featuring the new Ferromex paint scheme. This model includes finely detailed bodywork, authentic paint, and accurate decals. Equipped with standard DC, a powerful motor, and smooth operation, it’s the perfect addition to complete your collection.
